question: Sam is explaining to her friend Beth that prices for video conferencing software is increasing because more people are working from home. This relationship can be described by ________.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. The income effect on pricing refers to buyers’ belief in how much discretionary income they will have to spend.
That’s not correct. Customer-driven pricing is when companies choose to set their prices based on customer-driven objectives (i.e., what the customer is willing to pay for a product or service).
That’s not correct. Prestige pricing refers to the relationship between some high-priced items and increased demand.
The demand curve describes the relationship of demand and price for most goods and services.

detailedSolution: The demand curve describes the relationship of demand and price for most goods and services.
